function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced carrying capacity of elevators due to social distancing requirements","Impact":"Transport bottlenecks or disregard for social distancing rules","Mitigation":"Install multiple elevators to meet demand and limit elevator use through key card access","Technologies":"Key card access systems, elevator scheduling software","People":"Residents, building owners","Owner":"Building owners, property management"},{"Description":"Need for retrofitting existing building stock to pandemic-proof residential housing","Impact":"Challenges in retrofitting existing buildings, especially heritage buildings","Mitigation":"Streamlined permitting procedures, innovative retrofitting technologies","Technologies":"Retrofitting technologies, virtual permit applications","People":"Architects, building owners, city planners","Owner":"City authorities, building owners"},{"Description":"Emphasis on stairs as the main mode of inter-storey communication creating public health benefit","Impact":"Increase in personal fitness, potential discrimination against persons with mobility or health issues","Mitigation":"Inclusive design, availability of elevator systems for those with mobility issues","Technologies":"Accessible design features, elevator access control systems","People":"Residents, persons with mobility or health issues","Owner":"Architects, building owners"}]}
